plugin.name: Finken
plugin.author: steup@ovgu.de
plugin.description: Link of the FINken Quadcopters controlled by Paparazzi to CoppeliaSIm

command.name: registerCopter
command.description: Register a virtual FINKen with the plugin.

param.name: rotorCount
param.description: Number of rotors of the copter (unused).

param.name: sensorCount
param.description: Number of sensors of the copter (unused).

param.name: result
param.description: True if successfully registered, false otherwise

command.name: addSensor
command.description: Add a sensor to a copter.

param.name: type
param.description: type of the sensor (one of {Accelerometer, Attitude, Height, Position}

param.name: sigma
param.description: Standard deviation of zero-mean gaussian noise added to sensor output

param.name: result
param.description: True if successfully registered, false otherwise

command.name: addRotor
command.description: Add a rotor to a copter.

param.name: position
param.description: Position code of rotor for copter control (one of {NW, NE, SE, SW}).

param.name: result
param.description: True if successfully registered, false otherwise
